title: [NGK3搬运]1:1 Recreation: Liaodi Pagoda — 1:1重建 料敌塔
author: NGK3
txt_content:
本帖最后由 NGK3 于 2018-7-5 21:49 编辑 

[ 2000x2000 multi biomed map - 生物群系地图 ]
 作者原文：
Hello, PMC! 
First off, I would like to apologize for my long inactivity. Even after passing Level 50 here, I still didn't bother to submit anything for the people who keep up with my work. Thankfully for my increasingly guilty conscience, I now have something to share. It's rather different from the many maps that I'd been almost exclusively posting for a long time. My latest PMC creation is a real-life Chinese pagoda. 

Liaodi Pagoda is located in Dingzhou City, Hebei Province, China. It was constructed during the Song Dynasty in 1055. At the time, it was part of a monastery complex, but also had a secondary purpose as a watchtower to observe any raiding parties sent by the rival Liao Dynasty to the north. The monastery no longer exists, but the pagoda still stands. The reason that I selected it for recreation is that this particular brick pagoda is the tallest remaining pre-modern pagoda in China. Beyond that, I found it's rather dramatic tapering shape appealing. My recreation, like the real version stands 84 meters tall and has 11 stories. I have replicated the exterior to the best of my abilities, and placed the pagoda in a park-like area loosely based on the real park that it is located in in Dingzhou City. Because I could not find any pictures of the interior, I have mostly left it empty, apart from the vaulted brick and painted wooden ceilings that were mentioned in some accounts. Here is the Wikipedia article if I missed anything. 

Disclaimer: This build requires the 1.12.2 version of the Conquest Reforged mod to function. It is absolutely essential; the map will not load properly without it! 

I intend to be somewhat more active going forward than I have been in the past few months. I hope that you enjoy my recreation of this historic pagoda.

译文：
Hi，PMC。
首先，我想为我长期不活跃而抱歉，在达到50级后，我没有发布作品了。
值得庆幸的是，我越来越内疚，现在，我有东西要和大家分享。
这与我长期以来的作品大有不同。这次我最新的建筑是一个真实的中国塔。
料敌塔位于中国河北定州市，它建于1055宋代时期。当时，它是一个寺庙的一部分，但它有一个作用，就是作为一个望塔，它需要观察军队。现在，那个寺庙已经不在了，但料敌塔仍屹立不倒。
我之所以建筑它是因为这个特别的塔是中国现代现存的最高塔。
我的重建，就像真正的一样。高84米，共有11层。
我已经尽最大能力重建它。并将塔放在了公园般的地上（译者：就是四周也有做绿化）可惜的是，我没能找到塔内的照片，无法重建内饰。
这是维基百科的介绍。
这是百度百科的介绍
